nodes.title: üëë Pixaroma - Note - START HERE (Episode 65)
widgets_values:
# MODELS AND NODES USED IN THIS WORKFLOW  

---

## üß© Node Required  
- **VibeVoice ComfyUI** (install via ComfyUI Manager)

---

## üéôÔ∏è VibeVoice-Q8 Setup (ComfyUI)

---

### üü£ Step 1 ‚Äî Create the Base Folder
Create a folder named **vibevoice** here:
```
.../ComfyUI/models/vibevoice/
```

---

### üü£ Step 2 ‚Äî Add the Tokenizer (Required)
Inside the `vibevoice` folder, create another folder named **tokenizer**:
```
.../ComfyUI/models/vibevoice/tokenizer/
```

Download the **Qwen2.5-1.5B tokenizer** files from:  
üëâ [https://huggingface.co/Qwen/Qwen2.5-1.5B/tree/main](https://huggingface.co/Qwen/Qwen2.5-1.5B/tree/main)

Then place these files inside the **tokenizer** folder:
```
tokenizer_config.json
vocab.json
merges.txt
tokenizer.json
```

---

### üü£ Step 3 ‚Äî Add the VibeVoice-Q8 Model
Inside the same `vibevoice` folder, create another folder named **VibeVoice-Q8**:
```
.../ComfyUI/models/vibevoice/VibeVoice-Q8/
```

Download the model from:  
üëâ [https://huggingface.co/FabioSarracino/VibeVoice-Large-Q8/tree/main](https://huggingface.co/FabioSarracino/VibeVoice-Large-Q8/tree/main)

Place these files inside the **VibeVoice-Q8** folder:
```
config.json
generation_config.json
model.safetensors.index.json
model-00001-of-00003.safetensors
model-00002-of-00003.safetensors
model-00003-of-00003.safetensors
preprocessor_config.json
```

---

### üü£ Model Info
Size: ~11.6GB download (38% reduction from full model)  
VRAM: ~12GB (40% reduction from full precision)  
Speed: Balanced inference  
Quality: Identical to full precision - perfect audio preservation  
Use Case: Production-quality audio with 12GB VRAM GPUs (RTX 3060, 4070 Ti, etc.)  
Quantization: Selective 8-bit - only LLM quantized, audio components at full precision  

---
